title: Chicken Arroz Caldo (Chicken Rice Porridge)
ingredients: 1 (2 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and thinly sliced
2 ¼ pounds chicken wings, split and tips discarded
1 teaspoon fish sauce for sprinkling, if desired (Optional)
method: Step 2: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat. Cook and stir onion, garlic, and ginger in hot oil until fragrant, about 5 minutes.
Step 3: Add chicken wings; cook and stir for 1 minute. Stir in fish sauce, cover, and cook another 2 minutes.
Step 4: Pour chicken broth into the pot. Stir in sweet rice and bring mixture to a boil. Cover and cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent rice from sticking to the bottom of the pot.
Step 5: Season with salt and pepper. Portion soup into bowls and garnish with green onion.
Step 6: Serve with lemon slices and additional fish sauce, if desired.
